TEIReader Overview¶

TEIReader is mutlifunctional tool which has a goal of automation some Linguistic experiments with XML files from Textgrid. It uses different machine learning tools and programs. The program is actively maintained in Github. It is written mainly in python and is compatible with both python versions 2.7/3.x.
